Package gui

Class AccountCard

java.lang.Object
gui.AccountCard
public class AccountCard extends Object
This class represents an account card that allows the user to select or create an account and play the game. The account card consists of a panel for creating a new account, a panel that contains a table for displaying and selecting an existing account, and button to start new game with the selected account. The class also has a reference to a Controller object that is used to communicate with the model.
Author:
Simone
